sentences.en: But being the opportunist that I was, I enjoyed the ride.
sentences.cn: 但我是个机会主义者, 我喜欢搭这种偏见的顺风车.

sentences.en: Eric Cantona made the game safe with a brilliant opportunist goal.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·坎通纳抓住机会踢进绝妙的一球，锁定了比赛的胜局。

sentences.en: He's a bit of an opportunist.
If we do not despise him with regard to the whole, we shall commit opportunist errors.
sentences.cn: 如果不是在整体上藐视敌人, 我们就要犯机会主义的错误.

sentences.en: Like most successful politicians, Sinclair was an opportunist.
sentences.cn: 跟大多数得志的政客一样，辛克莱也是个机会主义者。

sentences.en: Man is an opportunist above anything else.
sentences.cn: 人类对于每件事都是机会主义者.

sentences.en: These high primates , gorilla and chimpanzee, are described as herbivores and opportunist carnivores, i . e.
sentences.cn: 这些高等灵长目, 大猩猩和黑猩猩, 被认为是食草动物和偶尔的食肉动物.

sentences.en: Voters dislike opportunists – politicians who change their policies according to opinion polls.
sentences.cn: 选民不喜欢机会主义分子——那些根据民意调查结果来改变方针的政客。

sentences.en: Whoever overlooks or belittles this point will commit Right opportunist mistakes.
sentences.cn: 谁要是忽视或轻视了这一点,谁就要犯右倾机会主义的错误.

sentences.en: Your goal is to create a continuing impression, but not an opportunist.
sentences.cn: 你要给对方留下唯一深刻印相, 但无所不能让其以为你是机遇主义者.
